"...Beautiful. How beautiful it is. Don': "This form without flaws. So graceful and soft. Fur which can only be described as \"perfect to the touch\"."
"And foremost, the love it has for me. The elegant way in which it always snuggles with me... Mmm, elegant!"
"1. What are you talking about?"
"2. Who are you?"
"What?! You still don't understand what I'm talking about after I told you so much?"
"Hm? By the way, who are you again? Ah, no, never mind. Aside from these children, I have no real interest in anyone else."
"How rude! By the way, who are you again? Ah, no, never mind. Aside from these children, I have no real interest in anyone else."
"My name is Pietro, and this here is my beloved child, Catherine."
